rationale: The note includes the clinician's advice to take metformin with meals to reduce stomach upset, but does not document the patient's question about metformin timing.
The note does not include the patient's report of experiencing stomach upset when taking metformin on an empty stomach.
The note does not mention the patient's difficulty in adhering to the twice-daily metformin schedule due to a busy lifestyle.
The note does not suggest any practical strategies to improve medication adherence.
The note does not mention the patient's current condition of polycystic ovary syndrome in the context of metformin use.
The note does not document any follow-up plan or further assessment related to the patient's medication adherence challenges.
